# Towards the Sun (film)

| runtime        = 13 minutes
| country        = Poland
| language       = Polish
| budget         =
}}
Towards the Sun () a 1955 Polish documentary film directed by Andrzej Wajda. The film is about Xawery Dunikowski, a Polish sculptor notable for surviving the Auschwitz concentration camp.
